cards.export: Export forwarding as a CSV file

missingHeader.message: The CSV file you uploaded has no heading line. These are required for the import. You can find example CSV formats in the documentation.

importFailed.title: The redirects could not be imported
importFailed.message: All {total} redirects failed. More information can be found in the log below.

importIncomplete.title: Some of the redirects were imported
importIncomplete.message: {Total} redirects were imported. There was an error with {errors} redirects . More information can be found in the log below.

notice.top: Note: The CSV file for this import must be in a certain format. You can find a detailed description and examples in the documentation.

fileInput.label: Select a CSV file to upload

filerTabs.showOnlyBugs: Show only log entries with errors

list.openInNewTab: Open the configuration in a new tab
list.openDuplicateInNewTab: Open the configuration of the existing forwarding in a new tab
list.sourceAlreadyExists:
Forwarding already exists
In the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file you have defined a forwarding for whose forwarding source a forwarding is already configured in the system.
list.missingSource:
Missing forwarding source
You have not entered a field in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file that defines the source of the forwarding. Possible fields are: sourceProductNumber, sourceInternalUrl, sourceCategoryId and sourceProductId
list.missingTarget:
Missing forwarding destination
You have not entered a field in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file that defines the destination of the forwarding. Possible fields are: targetProductNumber, targetInternalUrl, targetCategoryId, targetProductId and targetExternalUrl
list.invalidHttpStatusCode:
Invalid HTTP Status Code
You have passed the value "{httpStatusCode}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column httpStatusCode . This is not a valid HTTP status code. 301 or 302 is possible.
list.invalidSourceProductNumber:
Invalid product number
You have passed the value "{productNumber}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column sourceProductNumber . This product number could not be found in the system.
list.invalidSourceInternalUrl:
Invalide Sales Channel Domain
In the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file you passed the value "{url}" in the column sourceInternalUrl . No or no valid sales channel domain could be determined.

To set an internal URL you have to enter it in the CSV import including domain. Also check whether you have saved the URL with HTTP or HTTPS in the Shopware configuration.

Example:
http: //www.mein-shop. de / Meine-url or
http://www.mein-shop.de/meine-url
list.invalidSourceInternalUrlEmptyBaseUrl:
Missing URL path
You have passed the value "{url}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column sourceInternalUrl . A forwarding of the start page cannot be configured in the current version of the plugin.
list.invalidSourceCategoryIdNotFound:
Invalid category Id
You have passed the value "{categoryId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column sourceCategoryId . No category with this ID could be found in the system.
list.invalidSourceCategoryIdUuidFormat:
Invalid category Id
You have passed the value "{categoryId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column sourceCategoryId . This is not a valid HEX ID.
list.invalidSourceProductIdNotFound:
Invalid product id
You have passed the value "{productId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column sourceProductId . No product with this ID could be found in the system.
list.invalidSourceProductIdUuidFormat:
Ungültige Produkt Id
Du hast in der Zeile {rowIndex} der CSV Datei in der Spalte sourceProductId den Wert "{productId}" übergeben. Hierbei handelt es sich um keine valide HEX ID.
list.invalidTargetProductNumber:
Invalid product number
You have passed the value "{productNumber}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetProductNumber . This product number could not be found in the system.
list.invalidTargetInternalUrl:
Invalide Sales Channel Domain
You have passed the value "{url}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetInternalUrl . No or no valid sales channel domain could be determined.

To set an internal URL you have to enter it in the CSV import including domain. Also check whether you have saved the URL with HTTP or HTTPS in the Shopware configuration.

Example:
http: //www.mein-shop. de / Meine-url or
http://www.mein-shop.de/meine-url
list.invalidTargetInternalUrlEmptyBaseUrl:
Missing URL path
You have passed the value "{url}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetInternalUrl . A forwarding to the start page cannot be configured in the current version of the plugin.
list.invalidTargetCategoryIdNotFound:
Invalid category Id
You have passed the value "{categoryId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetCategoryId . No category with this ID could be found in the system.
list.invalidTargetCategoryIdUuidFormat:
Invalid category Id
You have passed the value "{categoryId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetCategoryId . This is not a valid HEX ID.
list.invalidTargetProductIdNotFound:
Invalid product id
You have passed the value "{productId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetProductId . No product with this ID could be found in the system.
list.invalidTargetProductIdUuidFormat:
Invalid product id
You have passed the value "{productId}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetProductId . This is not a valid HEX ID.
list.invalidDeviatingDomain:
Invalid different domain
You have passed the value "{deviatingDomain}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column targetDeviatingDomain . No sales channel domain could be determined that matches this.

Please note that the domain must be stored 1: 1 as it is defined in Shopware in the configuration of the sales channels. Possible sources of error are that the domain was specified with http instead of https or that a slash was forgotten or accidentally set at the end.
list.invalidRestrictionDomain:
Invalid domain restriction
You have passed the value "{restrictionDomain}" in the row {rowIndex} of the CSV file in the column sourceRestrictionDomains . No sales channel domain could be determined that matches this.

Please note that the domain must be stored 1: 1 as it is defined in Shopware in the configuration of the sales channels. Possible sources of error are that the domain was specified with http instead of https or that a slash was forgotten or accidentally set at the end.

notification.titleSaveError: The element could not be saved!

deleteModal.title: Delete redirect
deleteModal.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this redirect?

notification.titleSaveError: When saving an error has occurred
notification.messageSaveError: The item could not be saved.

labels.parameterForwarding: Forward parameters of the source URL to the destination URL
labels.sourceSalesChannelDomainRestrictionIds: Only carry out this forwarding for the following domains:

errors.defaultError: This field can not be empty

placeholder.sourceSalesChannelDomainId: Enter the domain of the source URL ...
placeholder.redirectSalesChannelDomainId: Enter the domain of the destination URL ...
placeholder.sourceProductId: Specify the product for which you want to set up forwarding ...
placeholder.sourceCategoryId: Specify the category for which to redirect.
placeholder.redirectProductId: Specify the product to forward to ...
placeholder.redirectCategoryId: Specify the category to forward to ...

helpText.hasSourceSalesChannelDomainRestriction: Activate this option to define that the forwarding is only carried out for the domains defined below.
helpText.hasDeviatingRedirectSalesChannelDomain:
By default, the target domain corresponds to the source domain. Activate this option to define a different domain as the target domain.

If the category or article is not available for the target domain, no forwarding takes place.
helpText.parameterForwarding:
If this option is activated, the so-called GET parameters of the source URL are forwarded to the target URL.

Example:
Source URL: https://www.mein-shop.de/source-url?foo=bar

Target URL: https://www.mein-shop.de/target-url?foo=bar

noRedirectText.product: There is no redirect for this product.
noRedirectText.category: There is no redirect for this category.

createLinkText.product: Now create a redirect for this product
createLinkText.category: Now create a redirect for this category

redirectText.product: A redirect has been defined for this product via SEO Professional.
redirectText.category: Forwarding was defined for this category via SEO Professional.

componentRedirectWidget.showRedirect: Open the configuration of the forwarding
componentRedirectWidget.redirectIsForFollowingDomains: The forwarding is carried out for the following domains:
componentRedirectWidget.redirectIsForAllDomains: The forwarding is carried out for all domains.
